main.line1: So, where do YOU store your
main.line3: if you answer any of [a] in my head [b] in my disk [c] in my notes... or related... you need to think again:
main.line5: a seamless service storing your serialized ideas on ethereum, giving you a proof of submission and a timestamp. Why?: Help the world and get the credits you deserve! On your cv, your Linkedin profile and more
main.signInDetails: Get your serialized idea on blockchain, in minutes, no wallet required

list.title: Set your ideas in stone!
list.description: your idea is serialized and stored on Ethereum public blockchain. You can prove at any time that you saved this idea at the specific point in time

list.title: Reference your ideas in your CV!
list.description: Showcase your innovation mindset in your CV and professional profiles such as Linkedin. Demonstrate the traction you get in the ideachain network

list.title: Build a meaningful network!
list.description: Network based on interest, collaboration and interactions driven by your ideas! Explore teams, like-minded visionaires and entrepreneurs

signInArea.title: Sign-in now - its FREE
signInArea.description: Sign-in with your favorite social media account below, create and share any number of ideas; store up to three ideas on blockchain for free

getMoreArea.title: Get More
getMoreArea.description: Get the free package +10 ideas on blockchain for free + full search on top of the ideachain + private storage on blockchain

quotes.title: the most meaningful blockchain application so far
